title: His Childhood Friend is a Beautiful, Reclusive Girl, So He Spends His After-School Hours in Her Room (But He’s Not Her Boyfriend!) - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Caring Protagonist   Childhood Friends   Childhood Love   Cute Story   Early Romance   Heartwarming   Hikikomori   Honest Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Perverted Protagonist
author: Nagana Youichi   永菜葉一
description:
This flirting is more than lovers! After-school love comedy with a childhood friend who wants to spoil you!

I, Mikami Souta, a high school student, have a childhood friend.

The beautiful high school girl, Kisaragi Yuika.

However, she’s lazy, spoiled, and a hardcore recluse.

I visit Yuika’s room after school to keep up with her lazy life…

As a thank you for the billing card, she hugged me, we watched anime closely next to each other, and even slept together once in a while!

But we’re not lovers.

“You can’t fall in love with me, okay?”

It’s a precautionary measure to protect our current lifestyle so that we can remain “childhood friends.”

But then… why the heck are you approaching me with a kissing face!?

An after-school lovey-dovey comedy about childhood friends who are more than just lovers!>
